title: ICE when using `#[lang = "start"]` in a `#[no_std]` static library

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code Reproducing the bug seems to require two crates. Crate `ice-test`, file `main.rs`: ```Rust #![no_std] #![feature(lang_items)] extern crate ice_test_lib; use core::panic::PanicInfo; fn main() {} #[panic_handler] fn panic_handler(_: &PanicInfo) -> ! { loop {} } #[lang = "eh_personality"] fn eh_personality() {} ``` Crate `ice-test-lib`, file `lib.rs`: ```Rust #![no_std] #![feature(lang_items)] #[lang = "start"] fn start(_: *const u8, _: isize, _: *const *const u8) -> isize { 0 } ``` I compiled using `cargo build`, and `ice-test`'s `Cargo.toml` listed `ice-test-lib` as a dependency. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.0-nightly (acca81892 2021-03-13) binary: rustc commit-hash: acca818928654807ed3bc1ce0e97df118f8716c8 commit-date: 2021-03-13 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.52.0-nightly LLVM version: 12.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder.rs:1157:17: get_optimized_mir: missing MIR for `DefId(4:4 ~ ice_test_lib[6871]::start)` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/acca818928654807ed3bc1ce0e97df118f8716c8/library/std/src/panic.rs:59:5 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.52.0-nightly (acca81892 2021-03-13) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [optimized_mir] optimizing MIR for `ice_test_lib::start` #1 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items end of query stack ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/acca818928654807ed3bc1ce0e97df118f8716c8/library/std/src/panic.rs:59:5 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: std::panic::panic_any 2: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::bug 3: rustc_errors::Handler::bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 7: rustc_metadata::rmeta::decoder::::get_optimized_mir 8: rustc_metadata::rmeta::decoder::cstore_impl::provide_extern::optimized_mir 9: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 10: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 11: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 12: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 13: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 14: ::optimized_mir 15: rustc_middle::ty::::instance_mir 16: rustc_mir::monomorphize::collector::collect_neighbours 17: rustc_mir::monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 18: rustc_session::utils::::time 19: rustc_mir::monomorphize::collector::collect_crate_mono_items 20: rustc_mir::monomorphize::partitioning::collect_and_partition_mono_items 21: rustc_query_impl:: for rustc_query_impl::queries::collect_and_partition_mono_items>::compute 22: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 23: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 24: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 25: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 26: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 27: ::collect_and_partition_mono_items 28: ::codegen_crate 29: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 30: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::ongoing_codegen 31: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 32: rustc_span::with_source_map 33: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
